TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CssStyleCollection extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含指定的 HTML 伺服器控制項的 HTML 階層式樣式表 (CSS) 內嵌樣式屬性 (Attribute)。

span.span: Contains the HTML cascading-style sheets (CSS) inline style attributes for a specified HTML server control.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 剖析所包含的 Web Form 網頁時，針對特定的 HTML 伺服器控制項所宣告的任何樣式被加入至集合。Any style declared for a particular HTML server control is added to the collection when the containing Web Forms page is parsed. 它會自動剖析，並公開透過字典模式應用程式開發介面的 CSS 屬性。It automatically parses and exposes CSS properties through a dictionary pattern API. 您可以管理透過伺服器控制項上的任何 CSS 屬性屬性。You can manipulate any CSS property on a server control through the property. 只使用索引集合中的 CSS 屬性的索引鍵和值。Simply use the CSS property's key and value in the indexed collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會逐一物件伺服器控制項。The following code example iterates through the object for an server control. 屬性用來決定伺服器控制項中，已宣告的樣式屬性，然後繫結屬性名稱與值新增到Web Form 網頁上的物件。The property is used to determine which style attributes have been declared on the server control, and then binds the attribute names and values to a object on the Web Forms page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection/CS/css1.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.CssStyleCollection/VB/css1.vb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 將樣式項目加入至控制項的 。

span.span: Adds a style item to the of a control.

summary.span: 使用指定的名稱/值組，將樣式項目加入至控制項的 。

span.span: Adds a style item to the of a control using the specified name/value pair.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要加入樣式項目存在於列舉型別之多載採用方法參數因為強型別。If the style item to add exists in the enumeration, use the overload of the method that takes an parameter because it is strongly typed. 這表示 新增項目將會包含 get 存取子以檢視項目時屬性。This means that items that are added will be included when viewing items with the get accessor of the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這兩個多載方法，將階層式樣式表以， ，和以程式設計方式控制。The following code example demonstrates how to use both overloads of the method to add a cascading style sheet to an , , and a control programmatically. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CssStyleCollection.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CssStyleCollection.Add Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CssStyleCollection.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CssStyleCollection.Add Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Adds a style item to the collection of a control using the specified enumeration value and corresponding value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要加入樣式項目存在於列舉型別，使用此多載方法，而不是多載不接受參數。If the style item to add exists in the enumeration, use this overload of the method rather than the overload that does not take an parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這兩個多載方法，將階層式樣式表以， ，和以程式設計方式控制。The following code example demonstrates how to use both overloads of the method to add a cascading style sheet to an , , and a control programmatically. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CssStyleCollection.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CssStyleCollection.Add Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CssStyleCollection.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CssStyleCollection.Add Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

value.span: 值 ，如果 不在伺服器控制項集合中，則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以程式設計方式加入的項目設定樣式具有的控制項集合屬性或方法採用的樣式項目計數會包含做為輸入的列舉值傳回與屬性並以字串常值，就會傳回包含屬性。Style items that are added programmatically to a collection for a control with the property or the method that take an enumeration value as an input are included in the count of style items that are returned with the property and are included with the string literal that is returned with the property. 這些屬性是強型別。These attributes are strongly typed. 如果您想要新增至伺服器控制項階層式樣式表屬性存在於列舉型別，使用這些強型別的方法。If the cascading style sheet attribute that you want to add to a server control exists in the enumeration, use these strongly typed methods. 如果您想要新增的屬性不存在於列舉型別，使用屬性或方法。If the attribute you want to add does not exist in the enumeration, use the property or the method. 嘗試存取中的列舉值尚未加入的控制項，或存取已新增的 CSS 屬性屬性或方法，會傳回`null`使用屬性。Trying to access an enumeration value in the of a control that has not been added or to access a CSS attribute that has been added with the property or the method, returns `null` using the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性傳回的值上設定的樣式控制項。The following code example uses the property to return the value of a style that is set on a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic CssStyleCollection.this Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CssStyleCollection.this Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic CssStyleCollection.this Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CssStyleCollection.this Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
